item.description:
Let's meetup to watch the Patriots at The Four's Sports Bar!

We'll order appetizers and have a few drinks.

Check out the Patriots website:

http://www.patriots.c...

Check out The Four's website:

http://www.thefours.c...

The restaurant won't give us a table unless everyone is there, so please change your maybe response to a yes as it gets a bit closer and please arrive at the meetup time, so that we can all sit together.

Please call the restaurant if you get lost to get directions. Please call me if you need to cancel at the last minute.

Cheers!

Lisa
617-999-9094

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Watch the Patriots at The Four's Sports Bar!
